title: NSW Tweed Coast Two & Three-Bedroom Beachfront Apartments 30 Minutes from Byron Bay
description:
Kick back and immerse yourself in the tranquil ambience of a prime oceanfront position, offering unparalleled views of one of Australia's most picturesque coastal stretches. Exquisitely designed two- and three-bedroom apartments provide spacious sanctuaries where you and your loved ones can revel in the ultimate laid-back beach experience. With direct access to the glistening shoreline, beach enthusiasts can relish warm days basking in the sun, riding the waves and discovering the charm of the Tweed and Byron Coasts.

For moments of serenity away from the lively coast, retreat to one of three shimmering pools and indulge in relaxation at the outdoor spa, soothing your body after adventurous days on the beach. Explore the awe-inspiring natural beauty that surrounds the resort or wander through the vibrant coastal town, easily accessing its eclectic boutiques, cozy cafes and delectable restaurants. Stay active with access to a fully-equipped gym or pamper yourself with a rejuvenating signature facial.
offer_address: 2/6 Pandanus Parade, Cabarita Beach, New South Wales 2488, Australia

title: Boutique Apartment Stay on New South Wales' North Coast
description: Discover a slice of paradise on the sparkling north coast of New South Wales at the Oaks Santai Resort Casuarina - a beach-chic sanctuary nestled between the Gold Coast and Byron Bay. Indulge in a relaxing beach getaway with a three or five-night stay including breakfast vouchers for The Bakers Caf√©, welcome bottle of wine, guaranteed late 12pm checkout, complimentary WiFi and more.
